entry.title: Blitz Odor Blocker Firearm Cloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Firearm Care
Price: 6.95

Blitz® Odor Blocking Firearm Cloth is ideal for neutralizing chemical odors. Cleans and protects firearms too!
  • Always place cloth back into a moisture proof pouch. Cloths can be used over and over.
  • Do not wash, as it will remove the special cleaning agents.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals.
  • Size: 11" x 14"
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20191 NOTE: ALL POLISHING CLOTHS MEASURED OPEN AND FLAT

entry.title: Blitz Firearm Cloth - 17 x 17
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Firearm Care
Price: 7.95

Blitz® Firearm Cloth is ideal for most metal surfaces. The cloth contains non-abrasive oil which cleans any surface rust, dirt, or residue left by handling as well as many other airborne agents. Will leave your firearms, knives and any other metal surfaces clean and protected.
  • Always place cloth back into a moisture proof pouch. Cloths can be used over and over.
  • Do not wash, as it will remove the special cleaning agents.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals.
  • Size: 17" x 17"
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20190 NOTE: ALL POLISHING CLOTHS MEASURED OPEN AND FLAT

Vendor: Blitz

Price: 6.95

entry.title: Blitz Bow Care Cloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Firearm Care
Price: 5.95

The Blitz® Bow Care Cloth is a plush suede microfiber cloth developed for wiping dust and grime that may build up from field use or storage. For use on all types of bows and soft enough for most surfaces.
  • Cloth can be washed and re-used.
  • Not for use on bow strings.
  • Contains no harsh chemicals.
  • Size: Polishing Cloth 8" x 8"
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA

entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Firearm Care
Price: 6.95

entry.title: Blitz Firearm Wipes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Firearm Care
Price: 7.95

Blitz Firearm Wipes provide a fast and convenient method for cleaning and protecting your firearms, knives, fishing tackle and other outdoor equipment. Leaves a protective coating to condition metal and helps prevent rust.
  • Applies synthetic layer of gun oil
  • Gun Wipes protects firearm from moisture
  • Easy to use gun wipes
  • 30 3.25 IN x 5.5 IN wipes
  • Contains no harsh chemicals
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20193
